body: Unfortunately this would be a subtle breaking change for existing users. In the current version, the filenames are shuffled uniformly (`buffer_size` is equal to the number of filenames) whereas this would use a window of size 8. For programs that depend on shuffling the input files to get sufficient randomness, switching to a small default buffer size might harm convergence.
